trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Guelph
There was one other sighting in Guelph on or around September 13th 2013
divs: Sighting Details7 orbs in the sky in massive triangle. 3 stayed in formation while others began to move around. Had no flashing lights like a plane. I never ever see helicopters in the area. Closest Air Force base is 2 hours east of here. Moved in ways a plane does not.
Summary: 7 orange-reddish lights in the sky in a perfect triangle. Then began to break formation except 3.
